name: Roguebois (BETA)
description:
Roguebois is an open-ended rogue-like game currently being developed by Max Howald with art by Jackson Whawell and, concepts by Nathan Taylor. The game is still in early development but a beta release will be available soon.

--Install Instructions--

1. Download the .zip file

2. Create a folder titled "Rogebois"

3. Extract the .zip file into that folder

--Update Instructions--

1. Download the updated .zip file

2. Extract the .zip file into your "Roguebois" folder *

3. Click "Replace Files"

* You do not need to create a new folder if you already have one as this will overwrite the old version with the new version

** All play time and achievements will be saved between updates
